com.jde.view.hud

Class HUD

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.view.hud.HUD

  • public class HUD
extends java.lang.Object
    This HUD class is a list of labels (sprites and text) to show ingame
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)
